title: VPN issue on Firefox
content: Hello everyone, when I turn on my VPN and I want to use Firefox, it disconnects my connection and I can't open any web page and website! Instead when I open a private page (incognito mode) everything is okay and Firefox works properly! Can you help me to figure out this issue?

title: Policitas de Segurança de Conteúdo
content:
Olá, bom dia, estou com problema com as Policitas de Segurança de Conteúdo.

Meu sistema operacional é 18.04, utilizo o Firefox pouco mais de dois anos e de umas semanas pra cá, o navegador começou a bloquear algumas página que eu sempre acessei normalmente, exemplo: Google Agenda e Jira da plataforma Atlassian. Nunca tive problema desse tipo com esses sites, e agora não consigo acessar. Esses sites são fundamentais pra mim, pois utilizo na minha rotina de trabalho, não gostaria de parar de utilizar o Firefox.

PS: No google Chrome, está abrindo corretamente.

Atenciosamente.
creator: giovanni.santos

title: Accented latin letters incorrectly displaying as cyrillic letters
content: Hi, Firefox is displaying letters with accents (e.g. letters from Spanish words) incorrectly as Cyrillic letters. This makes a lot of webpages difficult to read. This does not seem to be happening all the time. Neither does it seem to happen in other apps other than Firefox. I have my preferred languages for displaying webpages in Firefox set as En-GB, en, es-es, in that order. Ditto for my wider system settings. In terms of my wider system keyboards I do have Russian installed, in order of preference this is gb > us > es > ru. I'm wondering if there is anything I can do to ensure Spanish and other Latin letters display correctly?
creator: crabapplepie

title: Create recovery key and reset password
content: Hello, here is my problem: I forgot my password, and I don't have a recovery key. But I am logged in to my account in another session, so I have access to my account. I want to create a recovery key so I can reset my password without losing everything. Problem is, to create a recovery key you need to enter your password. If you ask why didn't you create one when you set your password. This recovery key thing did not exist when I was setting my password. Can anyone please help me with this? Thanks a lot in advance.
creator: deryacog

title: Browser survey
content: Hey, While I was surfing today I've been taken to a survey titled "Firefox browser survey 2022" and there I was asked some questions then it took me to a window where there was a prize and I was directed to scan the QR code. This survey was taken place on the following link: www.funkyoffer.net I'm here to ask whether this survey was carried out by FireFox or this is a spam/scam?

title: Account Data Wiped
content: I just reinstalled windows and logged into my Firefox account and all of my settings/bookmarks/extensions/passwords have all been wiped cleaned from my profile. None of my data/info is available. It's like I just made an entirely new account but I'm using the same login credentials as before.
creator: artmann.jeff

title: CRONOLOGIA NON VISIBILE
content: Premesso che non ho apportato modifiche alle impostazioni di Firefox browser, così come alla cronologia e non sono state aggiunte app (il tutto da mesi non è stato modificato), da ieri non posso vedere la cronologia aprendo l'apposita finestra. Navigo e non vedo i siti visitati. Tutta la cronologia di un anno scomparsa. I segnalibri salvati in barra degli strumenti e altre librerie si, ma la cronologia è scomparsa. Ho riacceso il computer più volte, aggiornato Firefox, ma ugualmente resta il problema e non si era mai verificato da 13 anni da quando uso questo browser! Qualche verifica (di quelle già disponibili nell'archivio già consultato) o soluzione?
creator: lettere.dalla.germania

title: Firefox using all my RAM & CPU
content: Why, with not very many active open windows, and just after opening, is FF using 175% of my CPU, not counting all the separate listings in my Activity Monitor. Plus it's using nearly all 16 GBs of my RAM. With every new update, I pray it will mean the browser will just work, and not use up all my computer's resources, but it just never does. Pretty soon, more & more of us will just give up on this browser, which used to work better, years ago, and has only gone downhill since.
creator: StevenCee

title: High CPU/memory/power usage
content: Hello, recently I noticed both of my computers get hot and fans get loud, I did some research and figured it's the Firefox that's causing it when I go to task manager the memory usage is always high and the CPU sometimes spikes up to 60-70% usage and the power usage is at very high . One of the laptops is windows 11 and the other is windows 10 . Please let me know if there's any fix to this. Thank you.

title: HTML5 video file not found
content: I have been running into this problem where video's on a site will suddenly start having this "HTML5 video file not found". The confusing this is that it's happening on sites where I was able to actually watch the video just a few seconds before, then I'll browse a few pages then suddenly all the video will show this. I click on the video, it will actually show it for a split second, then shows the "HTML5 video file not found". Most of the time I have to clear cookies, shut down Firefox, and in some cases even restart my PC before it fixes itself. But on some sites, it takes month's before it will suddenly work again. I don't understand why this keeps happening? I've googled fixes for this, and not a single one ever works. Is this a flaw with the Firefox browser, or the websites? Is there a way to stop this from happening because it's incredibly annoying?
creator: Nightlistic
